Help:Node.title: Discipline
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: Dismiss
StoryGuides have the ability to send players to the Holding Cell if they are being disruptive to the game. This is intended to be merely a temporary measure until an understanding can be reached which does not destroy everyone's enjoyment of the game.
Characters sent to the Holding Cell are trapped and will not be able to leave.
(The Holding Cell is intended solely for out-of-character (OOC) problems. In-character (IC) problems are dealt with by the Watch and Guard and characters might be sent to the Regional Jailhouse for a few days.)
You may appeal a StoryGuide action by mailing ce@skotos.net.
